mm.controller.server

Class ControllerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm.controller.server.ControllerServer

  • @Path(value="ganeti")
public class ControllerServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will by called by the user via a WebInterface and calls the methods of the server class via REST.
    Author:
    Benedikt Bakker

      • getInstances

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getInstances()
        This method will return a list of all instances on the server.
        Returns:
        the list of all instances on the ganeti server.

      • getInstanceInfo

        @GET
 @Path(value="{instance}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getInstanceInfo(@PathParam(value="instance")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String instance)
        This method will return a list of all attributes of a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the name of the instance which attributes will be shown.
        Returns:
        the list of all attributes of an instances.

      • getInstanceInfoParam

        @GET
 @Path(value="{instance}/{param}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getInstanceInfoParam(@PathParam(value="instance")
                                                                                                                             java.lang.String instance,
                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="param")
                                                                                                                             java.lang.String param)
        This method will return the status of a given parameter of an instances on the server.
        Parameters:
        instance - name of the instance which parameter will be shown.
        param - the name of the status which should be returned.
        Returns:
        the attribute of the given parameter of an instance.

      • createInstance

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public void createInstance(java.lang.String params)
        Creates an instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - a String of a JSONObject with all requested settings of the new instance.

      • deleteInstance

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="{instance}")
public void deleteInstance(@PathParam(value="instance")
                                                                java.lang.String instance)
        Deletes a given Instance from the server.
        Parameters:
        instance - name of the instance which should be deleted.

      • rebootInstance

        @POST
 @Path(value="{instance}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public void rebootInstance(@PathParam(value="instance")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String instance,
                                                                                                    java.lang.String type)
        Reboots a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - name of the VM which should reboot.
        type - must be a String of a JSONObject with either soft, hard or full for the type of rebooting.

      • startInstance

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{instance}/start")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public void startInstance(@PathParam(value="instance")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String instance,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String type)
        Starts a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - name of the instance that will be started.
        type - must be a String of a JSONObject with settings.

      • stopInstance

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{instance}/stop")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")

                                                                                                      java.lang.String type)
        Stops a given instance.
        Parameters:

      • renameInstance

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{instance}/rename")

                                                                                                          java.lang.String newName)
